content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs my computer, I previously encountered an error related to the display while trying to load an image of Spain using a shell command. To fix this, I executed another shell command to start the x11-common service and successfully load the image. Recently, I received a command to execute a shell command that started the x11-common service, exported the display, and loaded an image using gpicview from a specific file path.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb'Setting up X socket directories... /tmp/.X11-unix /tmp/.ICE-unix.\\n'\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: gpicview: not found\\n'"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo service x11-common start && export DISPLAY=:0 && eog /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/d65a4e40-6b24-4230-bb69-9510cbda8351.jpg"}}}'}]
"""
